short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect to AmazonSmile from Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically redirect to AmazonSmile while shopping on Amazon.

Amazon donates 0.5% of the price of your eligible AmazonSmile purchases to the charitable organization of your choice.
